items.definition: a very wide space or area
the general appearance of the natural environment, especially when it is beautiful
something that you do often and regularly, sometimes without knowing that you are doing it
an agreement to work with someone else to try to achieve the same thing
the amount of space between two places
a path through a countryside, mountain, or forest area, often made or used for a particular purpose
an area of land that is higher than the surrounding land
one of the periods into which a year is divided at school, college, or university
a person, often one of a group, who controls property and/or money for another person or an organization
control over a country or people
hate, extreme unfriendliness, or active opposition to someone
a small reptile that has a long body, four short legs, a long tail, and thick skin
a situation in which you are protected against disease or from legal action
the thick main stem of a tree, from which its branches grow
the period just before it becomes completely dark in the evening
someone who is in a place or situation where they are not wanted
the situation of being alone without other people
